data.question: In Vietnam, are individuals permitted to purchase and sell gold bars at home?
data.answer: According to Article 10 of Decree 24/2012/NĐ-CP on the management of gold bar purchase and sale, individuals are only permitted to buy and sell gold bars at credit institutions and enterprises that have been issued a License to trade gold bars by the State Bank.

data.question: What are the conditions for obtaining a License to trade gold bars?
data.answer:
As per Article 11 of Decree 24/2012/NĐ-CP, there are different sets of conditions for enterprises and credit institutions to obtain a License to trade gold bars:
Enterprises must: a) Be established and operated according to legal provisions; b) Have a charter capital of 100 billion VND or more; c) Have at least 2 years of experience in gold trading; d) Have paid an annual tax on gold business of 500 million VND or more for the last 2 consecutive years (verified by the tax authority); dd) Have branches and sales offices in a minimum of 3 provinces or centrally-affiliated cities in Vietnam.
Credit institutions must: a) Have a charter capital of 3,000 billion VND or more; b) Have registered for gold business; c) Have branches and sales offices in a minimum of 5 provinces or centrally-affiliated cities in Vietnam.
The State Bank will stipulate the procedures and required dossiers for obtaining the License.
